data.lyric:
[ti:Dance Monkey]
[ar:Tones and I]
[al:Dance Monkey]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.63]Dance Monkey - Tones and I
[00:02.06]Lyrics by：Toni Watson
[00:02.88]
[00:09.18]They say "Oh my God I see the way you shine
[00:12.68]
[00:14.21]Take your hands my dear and place them both in mine"
[00:17.75]
[00:18.83]You know you stopped me dead while I was passing by
[00:22.53]
[00:23.83]And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[00:27.59]
[00:28.13]Ooh I see you see you see you every time
[00:32.92]
[00:33.74]And oh my I I like your style
[00:37.36]
[00:38.05]You you make me make me make me wanna cry
[00:42.12]
[00:43.40]And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[00:47.29]
[00:47.84]So they say
[00:49.00]"Dance for me dance for me dance for me oh-oh-oh
[00:51.88]
[00:53.15]I've never seen anybody do the things you do before"
[00:57.11]
[00:57.69]They say
[00:58.89]"Move for me move for me move for me ayy-ayy-ayy
[01:01.78]
[01:02.98]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again"
[01:06.87]
[01:08.14]I said "Oh my God I see you walking by
[01:11.60]
[01:12.96]Take my hands my dear and look me in my eyes"
[01:16.70]
[01:17.56]Just like a monkey I've been dancin' my whole life
[01:21.63]
[01:22.59]But you just beg to see me dance just one more time
[01:26.51]
[01:27.16]Ooh I see you see you see you every time
[01:31.79]
[01:32.39]And oh my I I like your style
[01:36.18]
[01:36.88]You you make me make me make me wanna cry
[01:40.95]
[01:42.20]And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[01:46.04]
[01:46.62]So they say
[01:47.72]"Dance for me dance for me dance for me oh-oh-oh
[01:50.77]
[01:52.00]I've never seen anybody do the things you do before"
[01:55.85]
[01:56.46]They say
[01:57.61]"Move for me move for me move for me ayy-ayy-ayy
[02:00.66]
[02:01.72]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again"
[02:05.71]

[02:07.33]"Dance for me dance for me dance for me

[02:20.01]
[02:21.43]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again"
[02:25.32]
[02:27.17]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:32.44]
[02:34.27]Oh-oh oh-oh oh
[02:36.92]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh-ooh
[02:42.61]

[02:59.26]
